reviews.content: They are great. They just privatized the optical department where you get your glasses. That is not so great. I have been waiting over two months for my glasses. I called. The gentleman said there was a pricing issue. I don't even know what that means. I give it five stars because of the other departments. It is very good health care here. And actually the eye doctor, is super Duper awesome. I just have that one issue with the department that dispenses the glasses. it is run by a private company. This is why I don't want our government privatizing any of the VA. Listen, you will at times wait a while to be seen, you will get good health care, but you won't get a $900 bill.

Tough to rate. If you can ever get to an actual health provider, the care is marginal. However, it took a FULL YEAR to get an appointment. They refuse to give referrals to specialists. They have incompetent PA"s claiming to be MD"s. It took one nurse three try's to get a simple blood pressure reading. If at all possible, use another facility, don't go to this one. If you must go here be very vigilant about anything they do or say.
